import{toast,Slide}from"react-toastify";// eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/explicit-module-boundary-types
export var errorToast=function errorToast(){var text=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"An error occured";return toast(text,{position:"bottom-center",hideProgressBar:true,draggable:false,autoClose:5000,pauseOnHover:false,closeOnClick:true,transition:Slide,type:"error"});};
